gt_text: 'Welcome to somewhere you won’t want to leave until you absolutely must.''Check-out time: 11:00 AM sharp. Coffee available until 10:45.'
juding_criteria:
Here is a bullet list of required visual elements:

*   Hotel front desk
*   Letterboard (positioned above the hotel front desk)
*   Neat plastic lettering style (for the letterboard text)
*   Text on letterboard: "Welcome to somewhere you won’t want to leave until you absolutely must."
*   Small printed sign (positioned below the letterboard)
*   Text on small sign: "Check-out time: 11:00 AM sharp."
*   Text on small sign: "Coffee available until 10:45."
